mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(categoryno, name, namesub, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible) VALUES(CATEGORY_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{namesub}, 0, sysdate, #{seqno}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT categoryno, name, namesub, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET visible='Y' WHERE categoryno=#{categoryno}
UPDATE category SET visible='N' WHERE categoryno=#{categoryno}
mapper.select: SELECT categoryno, name, seqno, visible FROM category WHERE name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT name FROM category ) AND namesub = '-' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT categoryno, name, namesub, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category WHERE name=#{name} AND namesub != '-' AND visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT categoryno, name, namesub, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM category
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY seqno ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM category
WHERE UPPER(name) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(namesub) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%'
ORDER BY seqno ASC
